name: verifyGetExistingAuthorById
description: Verify get existing author by id.
statusMessage:

expected: Author(id=200, idBook=65, firstName=First Name 200, lastName=Last Name 200)
 but was: Author(id=200, idBook=64, firstName=First Name 200, lastName=Last Name 200)
